channel.title: Just got my first 99
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/99-1.png[/img]
I basically botted the whole thing so do you think I'll get rollbacked/banned?
And what skill do you think I should get 99 next (I'm f2p)

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Bot 1-2hours less a day for a week, do Firemaking now.

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

abatssk8ter:

Good job on first!, No offense at all but why cooking? what a useless skill.

Maybe because its one of the easiest to get to 99? I wasted around 5-6M getting my cooking to 99, but that is because I didn’t keep on track of what fish at what times, and ended up loosing a ton of cash before I realized it. Anyways, you say “useless”, but if you can get some cooking gaunts, ul burn a little amount of sharks per load = maximized profit.

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:16, topic:374008”]Good job on first!, No offense at all but why cooking? what a useless skill.[/quote]idk, i was doing fishing, got bored of it, started cooking, and badda boom, went for 99…

btw guys, im member now, so yea. looking like a pro wif ma cape

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:14, topic:374008”]Grats on 99 cooking for one, I got it on my account too.

question - I know when you get 2 or 3 99’s on your account, your skillcapes are trimmed. I’m currently f2p with my cooking cape on. If i get enough 99’s for a trimmed cape, will it automatically replace my cooking cape with trimmed (keeping it worn if so?), or will i be stuck with un-trimmed until i go mem again to buy it?[/quote]

Ya you gotta go and buy a new one and its 2 99’s

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Grats on 99 cooking for one, I got it on my account too.

question - I know when you get 2 or 3 99’s on your account, your skillcapes are trimmed. I’m currently f2p with my cooking cape on. If i get enough 99’s for a trimmed cape, will it automatically replace my cooking cape with trimmed (keeping it worn if so?), or will i be stuck with un-trimmed until i go mem again to buy it?

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I botted 99 cooking, and even when I was rolled back for other stats I kept that 99. (They lowered fletching to 98, with 7k exp to 99; took me 10 minutes to get it back)

Read full topic

item.description:

Nice account dude, It would be awesome if you got a roll back (With SKillcape on). Then you can sell on a website for heaps.

item.description:

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]For the next 99, are you going to go for cash, or quickness?

My two suggestions are woodcutting and mining.[/quote]thing is, i have enough logs for 99 firemaking, and enough feathers for a quick 99 fishing. and ofc woodcutting is quick. so eh, idk

Read full topic

item.title: Just got my first 99
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:5, topic:374008”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=469991.msg3436327#msg3436327 date=1292787697]

Keep on your skillcape, if you get a rollback and still have the skillcape on, you can sell on sythe for heaps.
[/quote]i’m f2p </3

Chances are you will probably not get a rollback.[/quote]yea, i’m pretty confident i won’t if i play safe right now too, cause i only botted 6 - 8 hrs a week, and the bot i used was pretty good…

Read full topic
